item.content:encoded:
FanDuel Promo Code: Get $200 in Bonus Bets +$100 off on Texas vs Alabama!

Don’t miss out on the FanDuel Bonus Code offer HERE.

Winners and Whiners has teamed up with FanDuel, and is providing NFL fans with an opportunity to find out why FanDuel is one of the best sportsbooks in the United States! Currently, new FanDuel users are invited to join the action by grabbing up to $200 in bonus bets on Winners and Whiners.

Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket

Claim Offer

One of the best things about the FanDuel Promo Code is that you will receive this offer regardless of if your first bet wins or loses. There are 16 NFL games to bet on this week, along with a huge slate of College Football and MLB games! Make sure to take advantage of the FanDuel Promo Code this weekend.

 

Will Texas Upset Alabama tonight?

  • Texas Longhorns at Alabama Crimson Tide
  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
  • Time: 7:00 PM EST 
  • Odds: Alabama -7 O/U 54.5

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert College Football Writer Michael Briggs states:

The Longhorns may be relevant again but don’t expect another close game between these teams in Tuscaloosa.

The Alabama defense is going to give Texas a rude awakening. Sure, the Longhorns have star talent, but wait ’til you see what the locked-in Bama defense does to them on Saturday. The Crimson Tide were almost robotic in their shutdown performance against Middle Tennessee and will look to expose Ewers and Texas as frauds for even entering the conversation of college football’s elite.

On offense, Alabama will score enough to win and cover. It’s a disciplined team (zero turnovers and two penalties in week one) — but that’s hardly surprising given the accountability on the Bama roster. This is a professional program brimming with players with realistic NFL aspirations. They understand if they’re not accountable on every play, there’s a guy behind them ready and able to take their job. The Tide committed 15 penalties against Texas last season, something Saban has likely reminded his players about more than once this week.

Milroe’s dual-threat ability will be a factor on Saturday, forcing the Longhorns to take some of their attention off the Crimson Tide’s other playmakers. That will prove deadly on several occasions, giving Bama the cushion it needs to comfortably cover the seven-point spread.

Prediction: Alabama -7

FanDuel makes it simple. Use FanDuel Promo Code: Get $200 in Bonus Bets +$100 off on Texas vs Alabama!

The FanDuel Promo Code offer is truly one of the best available among all sportsbooks. What makes FanDuel’s offer great is it is easy to understand, and it is a benefit to everyone who receives it. With FanDuel, new users will receive $200 in Bonus Bets + $100 off on NFL Sunday Ticket, regardless of if their first qualifying bet wins or loses on the first bet. 

I personally love how FanDuel overall has been to easy to work with. Their customer service is excellent, and they also offer a great variety of payout options. Depositing and making withdrawals are also easy.

Want a second opinion to tonight’s Texas vs Alabama game?

StatSalt.com Expert College Football Writer Craig Forde states:

Nothing like a massive game this early in the season, the results of which could set the tone for the rest of the pack seeking CFP bids. The Longhorns have stated this week that they will be looking to test Milroe’s arm, after holding Rice to just 149 passing yards and two interceptions. The Tide QB threw the ball just 18 times last week and though the Tide’s starting QB was able to complete 71% of those passes, it was against a defensive backfield that pales in comparison to what the Longhorns are going to throw at him. Texas’ defense is also athletic enough to chase him down should Milroe free himself of the pocket. Last season’s meeting was a 20-19 classic that went the way of Alabama. I don’t know if Texas pulls it off in Tuscaloosa, but I do think they will keep things close once again and put themselves in a position for a big W.

Take Texas getting the points.

Prediction: Texas +7

 

WOW! Sounds like the writers are split. Are you on Team Michael or Team Craig? We also have a team of Expert Hanidcappers who can win money today!

 

But first grab some free Bonus Bets wih the FanDuel Promo Code. FanDuel is a great sportsbook that has an amazing offer for new bettors to grow their bankroll immediately!

FanDuel Promo Code : Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket

Claim Offer

item.content:encoded:
Happy Friday! Mason Folz here and I have the Best MLB Player Props for Today and the Best Kentucky Sportsbook Promo Codes!

I’ve lined up three of my favorite MLB pitcher props with the odds according to Draft Kings, as I am expecting to cash in BIG before our weekend of NFL and College Football. All three of these pitchers have performed at a high level this season and I believe they have INCREDIBLE matchups today! Good luck if you are tailing, let’s have a great Friday!

Kentucky Sportsbok Promo Code for DraftKings: Get $200 in Bonus Bets. Claim right here!

 

Kentucky Sportsbok Promo Code: Get $200 in Bonus Bets

 

Andrew Abbott Over 5.5 Strikeouts (-160)

I will be hammering Abbott’s strikeout prop in this one, as he has recorded at least 5 strikeouts in five straight games and the Cardinals have continued to struggle on the road this season. They haven’t been extremely hot at the plate over their last three games either. They averaged 9.67 Ks per game in their last 3, as I see them struggling again in this one. Abbott has been solid all season and he’s going to show up in this one.

Take him to record Over 5.5 Strikeouts (-160)

 

Kentucky Sportsbok Promo Code: Get $100 in Bonus Bets + $100 Off NFL Sunday Ticket!

Claim Here

Taj Bradley Over 14.5 Outs Recorded (-175)

This is a MASSIVE game for the Rays and I expect Bradley to pitch deep into this game. He has also recorded at least 15 outs in four of his last five starts. He also picked up a win in his last start, as I see him picking up steam and starting to roll. It isn’t like Seattle has been this offensive powerhouse this season either. They only have the 19th highest team batting average, as I believe this game will be low scoring and tight.

Bradley will hang around and pitch long enough to record more than 14.5 Outs.

Yusei Kikuchi Over 15.5 Outs Recorded (-125)

I love this spot for Kikuchi, as I have been backing him a lot lately. He is 9-5 on the season and he only has a 3.63 ERA, as this Royals batting lineup doesn’t stand a chance. They have cooled down over the last two weeks and they still have one of the worst records in baseball. Yusei has also pitched for at least six innings in four of his last six starts. He’s been a reliable starter for the Blue Jays for the last month and a half and I expect him to dominate a poor Kansas City team in this one.

Take Kikuchi to record more than 15.5 Outs (-125).

Parlay Odds: +359

Yes, these picks might look a little bit safer today, but I promise you this is a great strategy when
setting up your parlays. If you can find three “Favorites” that you believe have a serious
advantage, then parlay them together, and let it rip! That’s exactly what I am doing today and I expect to CASH IN BIG! So, strap in tight and get ready to ride! Let’s have a FANTASTIC
Friday!

 

Kentucky Sportsbok Promo Code: Get $100 in Bonus Bets on Launch Day!

Claim Offer

  

You can also check out the premium picks from some of the industry’s hottest sports handicappers.

item.content:encoded:
The anticipation is under way as to when the North Carolina sportsbook promo codes will be available to NC residents.

Sports betting has been legal in North Carolina since March 2021, but is currently restricted to retail sportsbooks.   The North Carolina State Lottery Commission has until June 2024 to launch online sports betting, but many sports bettors are optimistic that January 2024 is a more realistic timeline.


The following are the major sportsbooks that are expected to launch in North Carolina once online sports betting is legalized with the best North Carolina Sportsbook Promo Codes on the market!

 

BetMGM Bonus Code: First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in Bonus Bets if you don’t win HERE

  • BetMGM’s interface is amongst my favorite and makes it easy to place bets and find what you are looking for
  • BetMGM also offers a reliable customer service phone line, whereas most other sportsbooks try to push customers away from calling.
  • The BetMGM rewards program and wide network of available states also makes BetMGM and great option


Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code: WAWMETAGET : Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets HERE

  • The profits boosts that Caesars Sportsbook come up with are a stand out feature. It is not uncommon to see 30-35 different customized bets from the book each day, and they have the odds promoted and easy to find. 
  • The Parlay options are also very special in this book and so is the functionality. You can seamlessly move throughout the app and combine most bets. 

DraftKings Bet $5+ and get $200 in Bonus Bets Instantly HERE

  • The welcome bonus is one of the best in the industry, with a low risk and high reward
  • Odds are generally competitive and come out earlier than other sportsbooks.
  • DraftKings offers early cash out on most bets, which allows you to take a profit or cut your losses before a game is over.
  • DraftKings offers incentives for power players, such as reduced juice for high-volume bettors.
  • DraftKings is a well-known and established brand, which gives it some advantages over smaller sportsbooks.
  • Draft Kings is one of the easiest sportsbooks to sign up for and function.

 

Free Notre Dame at North Carolina State College Football Prediction!

  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
  • Time: Noon PM EST
  • Odds: Notre Dame -7.5 O/U 50.5
  • David “The Dominator” Hess writes:

The Irish had a great defense last year, but an inconsistent offense kept them from competing for a national Title. Now they have a powerful ground game and one of the best QBs in the nation in Sam Hartman, so you can bet that the Irish will not take their foot off the gas here. They know that they have a shot at the playoffs and can’t afford to look past anyone. Notre Dame is off an easy win against Tennessee State, and they have just Central Michigan on deck, so there is no reason for them not to be focused in this one. Notre Dame has strong edges on both sides of the ball, and they have a massive edge at QB. The Defense will shut Armstrong down while the offense puts up enough to get a solid cover in this one.

Prediction: Notre Dame -7.5

 

FanDuel Bet $5 Get $200 + $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket HERE

  • FanDuel has a lot of boost, same game parlay, and recommended parlay options for those new to sports betting
  • You get the first time welcome bonus regardless of if your first bet wins or losses, which is a huge plus
  • Has a place for both high and low value and high and low dollar players
  • They release odds early, and often have lines that other books may not have

Here are some College Football games you may want to use your FanDuel Promo Code Bonus Bets on for the weekend:

  • Illinois at Kansas
  • Date: Thursday, Sept. 8, 2023
  • Time: 7:30 pm  EST
  • Odds: Kansas -2 OU 57
  • Free Pick from Mark Ruelle:

The Jayhawks return the most experience on offense in the country this season. Even with Daniels out in week one, the team still produced over 500 yards of offense. Daniels may be a game-time decision although Leipold’s comments after the game suggest that Daniels didn’t play in the opener more due to a lack of reps than injury. With another week under his belt, Daniels may be under center on Friday night.

Prediction: Kansas -2.

FanDuel makes it simple. Sign up today, bet $5, and also enjoy up to $200 in bonus bets that can be used on College Football or the NFL HERE.

  • Nebraska at Colorado
  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
  • Time: Noon PM EST
  • Odds: Colorado -3 O/U 59.5
  • Free Pick from Michael Briggs:

The Nebraska defense looked great against Minnesota, but the Golden Gophers’ passing game pales in comparison to Colorado’s aerial attack. At home in Coach Prime’s first game, the Buffaloes won’t miss a beat offensively.

I expect Colorado to play better defensively in week two, too. Sims was turnover-prone and too quick to desert the pocket against Minnesota — that won’t work as well against the athletes on the Colorado defense. They will make the Nebraska QB look too one-dimensional on Saturday, forcing him into picks when he’s pressing for conversions.

Once the Buffs take a commanding lead, they won’t relent. I’m very confident they will cover the spread, even with a sample size of one game.

Prediction: Colorado -3

item.content:encoded:
You can find the Best Betting Picks for the Chiefs vs Lions this Thursday Night Football on Winners and Whiners!  We also have all the Best NFL Betting Bonus Codes for tonight and the rest of the NFL Week 1 games.

Did you know that you can bet $50 on any NFL game today and get $250 in bonus bets by registering with Caesars Sportsbook promo code WAWMETAGET?

Well, you can right here!

By signing up through the links on this page, you’ll be eligible to activate Caesars Sportsbook exciting Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets promo code offer for the NFL season and in time to coincide with the start of the NFL season for the best betting picks.

  • Detroit Lions vs Kansas City Chiefs
  • Date: Thursday, Sept. 7, 2023
  • Time: 8:20 PM ET

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert NFL Football Writer Chris King states:

“Detroit was hot in the second half of last season but it will be a challenge for the Lions to go on the road in a hostile environment like Arrowhead to earn a win. The Lions have some holes that they hope will be patched up here but the fact remains that their secondary has a lot of questions at this point. Sure, this isn’t the Chiefs team of previous years where guys like Tyreek Hill were running free but they still have Patrick Mahomes. Plus, Andy Reid knows how to get the most out of the pieces he has to work with and that should be enough to help push the Chiefs to a home win in the opener.”

Prediction: Kansas City Chiefs -4.5

BetMGM Bonus Code: Gets you a $1,500 first bet offer as a new customer.

First Bet Offer get up to $1,500 paid back in

Bonus Bets if you don’t win

Claim Offer
Disclaimer
StatSalt.com Writer Craig Forde states: 

This is a game where I fully expect the ball to be flying from the jump. Two of the better gunslingers in the league going head-to-head to kick off the entire season and you can bet that they’ll want to put their arms on full display here. They’ll both also benefit from some thin defensive backfields to throw at. The defenses will need to be in the faces of the quarterbacks if they want to stop the pass, but both are also agile and capable of scrambling out of the pocket. The last time they met they combined to score 64 points. I expect something close to that again.

Take the over.

Read the rest here…

item.content:encoded:
Best Sportsbook Betting Promos For Today August 28

BetMGM Bonus Code WINNERS: Earn a cool $1,000 for any matchup this week!

BetMGM has an amazing offer that allows new clients to get up to $1,000 in bonus bets in return if their first wager does not win!

The bottom line is that you’ll get a refund in bonus bets, which is equivalent to whatever you lost, up to $1,000. Make sure to utilize the bonus code WINNERS to claim this offer.

College Football and the NFL season are here, and every day until October is about baseball, but if you are interested in other sports, BetMGM has options and offers for other markets of your choosing. Remember to follow this link to begin and use the BetMGM bonus code of WINNERS when signing up.

 If you are already with BetMGM and are looking for another reputable and safe sportsbook that is also offering deposit bonuses, look no further than https://winnersandwhiners.com/betting. 

In the world of sports betting, building a bankroll is something that every bettor should strive for. A bankroll is money that you have available to bet with. This money should be separate from the funds you use for daily and monthly living expenses and should not be depended on to pay rent, a mortgage, a car note, tuition, or food for your family. Setting aside a bankroll for sports betting and growing that bankroll without constantly adding money out of your personal funds is vital for long-term success. 

 There are several ways to build a bankroll, but one of the most effective is to use multiple sportsbooks.  

You can take advantage of different odds, bonuses, and promotions by having accounts with numerous books. Everyone wants to place winning bets, but winning every day is impossible. Using various books can help you build your profits by adding “free money” to your bankroll and giving you more chances to win long-term. 

 Using more sportsbooks gives you access to better odds. 

Each sportsbook offers different odds on the same events. By comparing odds across several books, you can search and find the best value and potentially secure higher payouts for your winning bets.  

Looking for more College Football bonus codes? Check out our sportsbook bonus codes for Caesars Sportsbook, DraftKings, FanDuel, BetMGM, BetRivers, BetFred, and more!

 

Each sportsbook has a unique set of bonuses. By using more sportsbooks, you have more access to bonus offers and promotions, and loyalty programs. You can use multiple sportsbooks to boost your bankroll by utilizing these offers. For example, you can sign up for welcome bonuses at different sportsbooks. Other benefits include ongoing promotions like cashback or reload bonuses, same-game parlay profit boosts, and occasional free bet bonus money that bettors can use. 

Using several sportsbooks is vital for serious players because the more sportsbooks you have, the more ability you will gain to bet frequently and place larger bets.  

 Every sportsbook has a limit per game. While some sportsbooks may be willing to take up to a $50,000 wager for a New Giants vs. Dallas Cowboys Monday Night Football Game, another sportsbook may limit it to just a $1,000 bet for that same game. When it comes to a college basketball game between Houston Christian and Lamar, you may be limited to just a $200 bet, and sometimes even less if you consistently win.  

Tough luck on your first bet? BetRivers has got you covered with a second chance bet up to $500!

You can join BetRivers today right here and get loaded up for the NFL season!

21+. Terms and conditions apply.

It is not unheard of for some bettors to be limited to only $25 bets on player props, so if you want to bet on Nikola Jokic to record over nine assists in an NBA game, you may find that the options and limits are much lower than what you run into when simply betting on a point spread or over/under. You can get around these low limits and find the best odds by having accounts with numerous books. By spreading your bets around between books, you can place more wagers and are less likely to be limited, especially if you are a big-money player who has been able to win consistently over time. 

It’s not fun to think about or advertise, but no sportsbook is perfect, and there is always the risk of technical glitches or other problems. By having accounts with multiple books, you can reduce the impact of these occurrences. If one sportsbook experiences technical difficulties, you can quickly switch to another platform and continue placing your bets without significant interruption. Using legal sportsbooks in the United States also dramatically helps you limit your risk.  

Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code WAWMETAGET – Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets for any game Monday August 28! You can grab that offer here!

Each sportsbook has its own set of odds and options, so using several books will provide a broader range of betting options, such as prop bets or alternative lines. By having accounts with multiple sportsbooks, you can access a more extensive selection of betting markets, allowing you to find unique opportunities and potentially increase your profitability. 

 Although using multiple sportsbooks is essential for long-term betting success and a great way to help you build a bankroll, it is essential to do your research.  

Before you sign up for any sportsbooks, be sure to compare the different available offers. Shopping the various offers will help you to find the best books for your needs. Each sportsbook offers different payment options and bonuses, so be sure to choose sportsbooks that offer payment methods that are convenient and affordable for you. It’s also important to review the terms and conditions before signing up for a book. Examining the details will help you to understand the rules and regulations that apply to your account. You want to be clear on how easily and often you can withdraw money from your account after winning and how that affects your bonuses.  

Sign up for FanDuel  here   for the opening weekend of College Football and get 10x Your First Bet (Bet $5, get $200 in Bonus Bets + $100 off on Sunday NFL Ticket).

 Remember to set limits for yourself. We all want to win big, but it is essential to set boundaries. When figuring out much you’re willing to bet, don’t solely think about what you can potentially win. It is more important to be realistic about much you can sustain losing without personally putting yourself in a financially straining position. Setting betting limits will help you to stay on track and avoid overspending. You also want to be patient because although deposit bonuses are a great help, building a bankroll still takes time and effort. Don’t expect to get rich quick. Just keep betting smart and you’ll eventually see your bankroll grow. 

 

And with Draft Kings you can Bet $5+ and get $200 in Bonus Bets Instantly. Sign up today!

If you want to bet on the NFL or College Football this season, follow the predictions and the Hottest Cappers on WinnersandWhiners.com and head over to our Sportsbook page for bonus codes and more offers.

The post Best Sportsbook Betting Promos For Monday August 28 appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.

Sign up in Kentucky  for FanDuel Promo Code ➡️ here ⬅️  for the opening weekend of College Football and get $100 off on the Sunday… Read More »FanDuel Kentucky Promo Code- illusive $100 Off on NFL Sunday Ticket

The post FanDuel Kentucky Promo Code- illusive $100 Off on NFL Sunday Ticket appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.
item.content:encoded:
FanDuel Kentucky Promo Code- Get $100 Off on NFL Sunday Ticket

by Arthur Reyes

FanDuel is coming to Kentucky! Do you want to bet on the Kentucky Wildcats this season?

Sign up in Kentucky  for FanDuel Promo Code here   for the opening weekend of College Football and get $100 off on the Sunday NFL Ticket.

 

SEC Champion Prediction: LSU Tigers (+460) @ FanDuel

As has been the case for several seasons, the Southeastern Conference (SEC) is loaded with talented teams in both the East and West divisions. The defending National Champion Georgia Bulldogs (-110) will win the East Division. I then expect Georgia to face the LSU Tigers (+450) in the conference Championship game, with the Tigers prevailing.  

Nov 5, 2022; Baton Rouge, Louisiana, USA; LSU Tigers quarterback Jayden Daniels (5) is tackled by Alabama Crimson Tide defensive lineman DJ Dale (94) and linebacker Chris Braswell (41) during the second half at Tiger Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Stephen Lew-USA TODAY Sports

LSU Quarterback Jayden Daniels will begin his second season under head coach Brian Kelly, and the offensive line should be much stronger than last season. The Tigers’ receiving corps, led by Malik Nabers (wide receiver) and Mason Taylor (tight end ), is one of the conference’s best. LSU has to play Alabama (+240) on the road, but the Tigers will prevail and win the division.  

 

The LSU defense gave up just 22.5 points per game last season and this season is even stronger upfront as Maason Smith is back following a knee injury that left him sidelined for most of the season last year. Linebacker Harold Perkins will create even more problems both against the run and the pass. LSU’s secondary has gone through a huge overall but a pair of transfers will eventually help the unit gel into a strong one after the first few weeks. 

 

Over/Under Win Total Best Bets:

Kentucky Wildcats over 7 

 Kentucky Wildcats scored an average of only 20.4 points per game last season, but with Liam Coen hired as the new play-caller for the Wildcats, Kentucky should see an improvement immediately. In addition, Kentucky landed a talented transfer quarterback when former North Carolina State Wolfpack signal caller Devin Leary decided to become a Wildcat. Kentucky will have to play Mississippi State as well as Alabama in crossover action but faces Vanderbilt and South Carolina, which should result in victories making eight wins a big possibility. 

 

Bet on the Wildcats win total today! Sign up for FanDuel FanDuel Kentucky Promo Code here   and get $100 off on the Sunday NFL Ticket.

 

Texas A&M Aggies over 8 

Texas A&M was one of the nation’s biggest underachievers in 2022 and still has question marks for this season but with coach Bobby Petrino in charge of play calling for head coach Jimbo Fisher, optimism reigns on the offense under quarterback Connor Weigman and wide receiver Evan Stewart. The Texas A&M defense was young and highly talented last season and will improve with experience. If the offense is able to improve, expect to see the Aggies win at least eight games. 

Alabama Crimson Tide Under 10.5 

 Alabama will once again be a highly talented football team in 2023 but the quarterback position remains unsettled. Last season, Alabama won 10 games during the regular season but beat Texas by just one point; beat Texas A&M by only four points; and defeated Ole Miss by just six points. This season Alabama will have new coordinators including offensive coordinator Tommy Reese, while Kevin Steele is the defensive coordinator.  


Sleeper: Tennessee Volunteers +1,500 to win SEC @FanDuel

The Tennessee Volunteers finished last season No.1 in the nation in scoring with an average of 46.1 points per game. Quarterback Joe Milton takes the reins this season in Knoxville, and the Volunteers will have each of their top three running backs returning, including Jabari Small, Jaylen Wright, and Dylan Sampson, who combined to rush for 5.6 yards per carry with 29 touchdowns on the ground. Tennessee does not leave the state except for a visit to Florida through the first 6 weeks of the regular season. Tennessee will face either Alabama or Georgia in the SEC title game if the Volunteers make it that far, and stranger things have happened.

 

If you are looking to bet on College Football this season, follow the Hottest Cappers on WinnersandWhiners.com and head over to our Sportsbook page for bonus codes and more offers. Also check out our Notre Dame season preview, Pac-12 Preview, and Conference USA Preview for free!

 

And remember with FanDuel you can get take $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket.

21+ and present in AZ, CO, CT, IA, IL, IN, KS, LA (permitted parishes only), MD, MI, NJ, NY, OH, PA, TN, VA, WV, or WY. Refund issued as nonwithdrawable bonus bets which expire 14 days after receipt. Restrictions apply. See full terms at fanduel.com/sportsbook. Gambling Problem? Check out the Conference USA action for… Read More »2023 Conference USA College Football Best Bets and Season Preview

The post 2023 Conference USA College Football Best Bets and Season Preview appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.
item.content:encoded:
2023 Conference USA College Football Best Bets and Season Preview

by Bosun Akinpelu

College Football Season kicks off Saturday August 26, and three Conference USA games are on the slate.

 

With FanDuel you can bet on all the Saturday College Football action, even the Conference USA schools!

Check out the Conference USA action for Week 1 on Saturday August 26:

UTEP at Jacksonville State at 5:30pm EST on CBSSN (preview here)

UMass at New Mexico State at 7pm EST on ESPN (preview here)

Florida International at Louisiana Tech at 9pm EST on CBSSN (preview here)

To bet on these games sign up for FanDuel  here

 

Conference Conference USA will look a little different this season after nine of their members over the past two seasons due to realignment. This season, the conference welcomes two former FCS teams in Jacksonville State and Sam Houston State University. They also added two FBS independents in Liberty and New Mexico State, leaving only five holdovers from last season.

 

Despite the addition of the new schools, only a few teams in the conference have a legitimate chance to compete for the Conference USA title this season. So, we will look at those teams and predict how many wins they will have this upcoming season with the odds according to FanDuel. 

 

Sign up for FanDuel  here   for the opening weekend of College Football and get 10x Your First Bet (Bet $5, get $200 in Bonus Bets + $100 off on Sunday NFL Ticket).

 

Liberty +125  to win Conference 

The Flames finished the 2022 season with an 8-5 record, which was the second-best record for Independents. During the offseason, former head coach Hugh Freeze left to coach at Auburn and the team has only eight returning starters from last season.

Despite the departures from last season, there is a lot of optimism about the upcoming season. They hired 2020 AL Coach of the Year, Jamey Chadwell, who had a 35-14 record at Coastal Carolina before taking the Liberty job.

Liberty wasn’t very good offensively last season, averaging 27.7 points per game. Their passing game was 88th in the country and their ground game was 51st.

Their offensive line should be better than it was last season after adding a few experienced transfers, led by former West Virginia offensive lineman Jordan White. They are also bringing back their top two quarterbacks from last season.

They lost their leading rusher Dae Dae Hunter, who entered the transfer portal, but they added Wake Forest transfer Quinton Cooley and top recruit Vaughn Blue, so don’t expect to see a drop-off in their running game.

The Flames were very good defensively last season, giving up points per game, which was 56th in the country. They led the country in tackles for loss and finished third in sacks. But, they only have four of their players coming back and they tried to fix the holes left through the transfer portal, so expect to see a drop-off on that end.

2023 Win Projection UNDER 8.5 (+134)

Liberty’s win total for the season has been set at 8.5 at -164. The Flames won eight games in each of the past two seasons. Even though Chadwell had a lot of success at his last job, the Flames lost a lot of players in the offseason, so go with them to win less than 8.5 games this season.

 

Sign up for FanDuel  here   for the opening weekend of College Football and get 10x Your First Bet (Bet $5, get $200 in Bonus Bets + $100 off on Sunday NFL Ticket).

Western Kentucky +125 to win Conference

Dec 21, 2022; New Orleans, Louisiana, USA; Western Kentucky Hilltoppers head coach Tyson Helton and players pose with the championship trophy after defeating the South Alabama Jaguars at Caesars Superdome. Mandatory Credit: Stephen Lew-USA TODAY Sports

 

The Hilltoppers finished the 2022 season with a 9-5 overall record and a 6-2 record in conference play, which was good enough for third place.

Western Kentucky had the second-best offense in the conference last season, averaging 36.4 points per game, which was 16th in the nation. They had a potent passing attack that averaged more than 350 yards per game, which was the second-best in the country.

Even though they lost offensive coordinator Jake Dickert, who took the head coaching job at Washington State, don’t expect to see a drop in their offensive efficiency because new offensive coordinator Drew Hollingshead, his Mississippi State team had the 10th-best passing offense in the country last season and the fourth in 2021.

The Hilltoppers also have quarterback Austin Reed, who completed 65 percent of his passes for 4,744 yards, 40 touchdowns, and 11 interceptions last season, and leading receiver Malachi Corley, who had 101 catches for 1,293 yards and 11 touchdowns last season.

Western Kentucky’s biggest weakness going into the season is on the defensive end, with only four starters from a unit that gave up 23.5 points per game last season coming back.

Defensive end JaQues Evans, who had 106 tackles, nine sacks, and 14 tackles for loss, will lead their young defense. The linebacker corps have a year under their belts and are expected to be better than last season, and the team added six transfers that they hope will have an immediate impact.

 

2023 Win Projection OVER 8.5 (+110)

Western Kentucky’s win total for the season has been set at 8.5 at +110. The Hilltoppers won nine games in each of the past two seasons. Their offense will be just as potent as it was last season and they shouldn’t suffer much of a drop on the defensive end. With two of the top three C-USA teams from last season playing in another conference, the Hilltoppers will win more than 8.5 games this season.

 

Middle Tennessee State +650 to win Conference 

The Blue Raiders finished the 2022 season with an 8-5 record and a 4-4 record in conference play, which was good for fourth place in the conference, and picked up a win in the Hawaii Bowl.

The Blue Raiders averaged 29.5 points per game last season, which was 59th in the country. Their passing game was 36th, but their ground game was 114th in the country.

Even though they lost their starting quarterback, Nicholas Vattiato played well in limited action, completing 65.2 percent of his passes for 293 yards and one interception. However, they lost their top three receivers, so don’t expect their passing game to be as potent as it was last season.

Frank Peasant led the team in rushing last season with 774 yards and nine touchdowns. But, he will be sharing the backfield with untested backs, so expect more of the same from their ground game this season.

Defensively, the Blue Raiders gave up 28.1 points per game, which was 82nd in the country. They have a good linebacker corps, but their defensive line didn’t get a lot of pressure on opposing quarterbacks and they gave up 304.7 passing yards per game last season, which was the most by a defense. But, with nine starters coming back, the unit should be better than it was last season.

2023 Win Projection OVER 6.5 (-105)

Middle Tennessee State’s win total for this season has been set at 6.5 at -105 odds. The Blue Raiders won at least seven games in six of their last eight seasons. Their offense likely won’t be as good as it was last season, but their defense should be improved. They have three tough road games against Alabama, Missouri, and Western Kentucky on their schedule, but the rest of the schedule isn’t very tough, so expect them to win at least seven games this season.

Looking for more College Football bonus codes? Check out our sportsbook bonus codes for Caesars Sportsbook, DraftKings, FanDuel, BetMGM, BetRivers, BetFred, and more!

 

The Dark Horse: New Mexico State +2,200 to win Conference 

Conference USA is a top-heavy conference, with Western Kentucky, Liberty, and Middle Tennessee State considered the best teams in the conference. But, the Aggies finished the 2022 season with a 7-6 record in Jerry Kill’s first year as head coach, after going 2-10 the previous season.

The Aggies averaged 25.6 points per game last season, which was 83rd in the country. Their passing game was 120th, while their ground game was 57th.

They have eight starters returning on offense, including dual-threat quarterback Diego Pavia, who completed 53.2 percent of his passes for 1,450 yards, 13 touchdowns, and six interceptions. He also ran for 508 yards and six touchdowns. They also have their top two running backs and four of their top five receivers coming back, so expect their offense to be better than last year.

Defensively, the Aggies gave up 24.3 points per game, which was 52nd in the country, which was a drastic improvement from the previous season, when they had one of the worst defenses in the country.

Even though they lost two of their top tacklers from last season and their best defensive back, they have experienced players like Tyriece Thomas and Izaiah Reed returning, so they will be okay against the run. Their secondary will be the weak link this season, but don’t expect much of a drop-off from them defensively.

 

2023 Win Projection OVER 6.5 (+134)

New Mexico State’s win total for this season has been set at 6.5 at +134 odds. The Aggies lost their first four games last season and went 7-2 in their nine games. They will be better than they were offensively last season, but there will be a drop-off on defense. They have the second-easiest schedule, with a road trip to Auburn being their toughest test, so expect them to win more than 6.5 games this season.

 

If you are looking to bet on College Football this season, follow the Hottest Cappers on WinnersandWhiners.com and head over to our Sportsbook page for bonus codes and more offers. Also check out our Notre Dame season preview for free!

 

And remember with FanDuel you can get up to 40x your first bet when you bet just $5 and receive $200 in Bonus Bets PLUS take $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket.

The weekend is finally here and I am looking to pay for all of your drinks tonight. But, first we are going to look at three pitchers that have great… Read More »Friday August 25 Best MLB Player Props for Parlay

The post Friday August 25 Best MLB Player Props for Parlay appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.
item.content:encoded:
Friday August 25 Best MLB Player Props for Parlay

Happy Friday! Mason Folz here and I am back again with another MLB Player Prop Parlay! The weekend is finally here and I am looking to pay for all of your drinks tonight. But, first we are going to look at three pitchers that have great matchups and they’ve been putting up STELLAR numbers all season long. So, ride with me today! Hop on these three MLB Player Props and get ready to land back in the GREEN!

Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets when you sign up with Caesar Sportsbook and USE Promo Code: WAWMETAGET 

 21+ Terms and conditions apply.

Tanner Bibee Over 17.5 Outs Recorded (-135)

I love this spot for Bibee on the road, as he is 9-3 on the season with a 3.01 ERA. He has consistently got the job done for his team all season long and he pitched great against this same Blue Jays team just three starts back. He pitched for seven innings and only allowed two earned runs, as I see him putting up similar numbers in this game. He will stay out of trouble for the majority of the game, as I expect him to pitch at least six innings. Toronto hasn’t been going crazy at the plate and I don’t see them lighting up Bibee early. Take him to record more than 17.5 Outs. 

 

Dylan Cease Over 17.5 Outs Recorded (-145)

I also really like this spot at home for Dylan Cease. The White Sox fell to the A’s yesterday and they are going to be highly motivated to bounce back in this game. Cease is arguably their best pitcher and he should be ready to bounce back in this game. He struggled against the Rockies in his last start, but now he is facing one of the worst offenses in the league. Oakland is averaging the least amount of runs per game and they are only 3-7 in their last 10. They will struggle in this game and Cease will pitch consistently throughout. Take Dylan Cease to record more than 17.5 Outs with the second pick of our parlay.

 

Spencer Strider Over 8.5 Strikeouts (-135)

I love this spot for the Braves and Strider. The Giants have continued to strike out all season and they haven’t overly impressed me as of late. They are 3-7 in their last 10 games played and they are averaging the fourth most strikeouts per game in the MLB. They are averaging 9.42 strikeouts per game, as this is a perfect spot for Strider at home. He actually faced this same exact Giants team in his last start, as well. In that game, he recorded 10 strikeouts, pitched for 7 innings, and only allowed 1 hit. He has the Giants number and I expect him to stay hot in this game. Take Spencer Strider to record more than 8.5 Strikeouts. 

 

Parlay Odds: +411
